card.name: Back-Alley Gardener
card.text: Alliance â€” Whenever one or more other creatures enter the battlefield under your control, seek a land card, then put it onto the battlefield tapped. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Bank Job
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the bottom creature card of your library. You may cast that card this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, if that card is still exiled, put it into your graveyard and create a Treasure token.

card.name: Cabaretti Revels
card.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, seek a creature card with lesser mana value, then put it onto the battlefield.

card.name: Choice of Fortunes
card.text: Seek two cards. You may shuffle them into your library. If you do, seek two cards.You have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.

card.name: Riveteers Provocateur
card.text: MenaceWhen Riveteers Provacateur enters the battlefield, choose a creature card in your hand without blitz. It perpetually gains blitz. The blitz cost is equal to its mana costBlitz {B}{R}

card.name: Skyline Savior
card.text: FlyingWhen Skyline Savior enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand. If it's a non-Angel creature card, it perpetually gets +1/+1, gains flying, and becomes an Angel in addition to its other types.

card.name: Traumatic Prank
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It perpetually gains haste, "This creature can't block," and "At the beginning of your upkeep, this creature deals 1 damage to you."
